CustomField.description: Link to the User Story feature branch in Git. The link is generated based on the Base Branch URL of the Git Repository record.
CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK( IF( AND( NOT(ISNULL(Project__r.Deployment_Flow__r.Git_Repository__r.Branch_Base_URL__c )), Project__r.Deployment_Flow__r.Git_Repository__r.Branch_Base_URL__c != '' ), IF( AND(NOT(ISPICKVAL(Project__r.Deployment_Flow__r.Git_Repository__r.Git_Provider__c,'')),NOT(ISPICKVAL(Project__r.Deployment_Flow__r.Git_Repository__r.Git_Provider__c, 'Others'))), Project__r.Deployment_Flow__r.Git_Repository__r.Branch_Base_URL__c + 'feature/' + Name , IF( CONTAINS(Project__r.Deployment_Flow__r.Git_Repository__r.Branch_Base_URL__c,'[BRANCH_NAME]'), SUBSTITUTE(Project__r.Deployment_Flow__r.Git_Repository__r.Branch_Base_URL__c,'[BRANCH_NAME]','feature/' + Name), Project__r.Deployment_Flow__r.Git_Repository__r.Branch_Base_URL__c + 'feature/' + Name ) ), '' ), 'feature/' + Name )
